Name: Xiaxie
Alliance: Beimo wushê (Beimen five shê ritual alliance)

Raw.Settlement: The population of Xiaxe is over 500 people.
Raw.Surname_Groups: The main surname group is the Li 李.
Raw.Village_Temples: 1) Longxingshê 隆兴社 is dedicated to Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人. 2) Songfenggong 松峰宫 is dedicated to Tianshang shengmu 天上圣母.

Rituals.Processions: ianshang shengmu 天上圣母 is carried to each household to xingdao (carry out the Dao). Opera is performed, and Daoist ritual masters conduct rites.
Rituals.Birthday: 9/27: the celebration of Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土 夫人 is held with opera and Daoist rites.
